modName: Megaton Hammer retexture for Dwarven Warhammers
summary: Basically replaces the textures on the Dwarven Warhammer to resemble the Megaton Hammer from Zelda.
descriptionHtml:
Basically replaces the textures on the Dwarven Warhammer to resemble the Megaton Hammer from Zelda. 

Installation instructions:
Place the two textures (dwarvenwarhammer.dds and dwarvenwarhammer_m.dds) in Skyrim/Data/Textures/Dwarven

To uninstall, delete the files from the same location.

Have fun!

Special thanks to spiderman0123 for inspiring this.
author: ItalicMan
